title.rendered: Life Skills and Value Education for NK Academy students

content.rendered:
A specially designed life skills and value education workshop was conducted for students of NK Academy, Bokara in Nagpur. A total of 50 children participated very enthusiastically in the workshop.

The children were give interactive exercises, some of which could also be done at home, to perceive and evaluate the values they follow and uphold. The self evaluation activities were to be taken individually and as a group. The children were also asked to assess the values they do not possess and need to inculcate and practise in their day to day life for their over-all development.

The feedback from the students and the teachers was very encouraging.
